## Meetings class

Maintain a cache of meetings and sync with services. 

**Signature:**

```typescript
export default class Meetings extends WebexPlugin 
```
**Extends:** WebexPlugin

|  [register()](./plugin-meetings.meetings.register.md) |  | Explicitly sets up the meetings plugin by registering the device, connecting to mercury, and listening for locus events. |
|  [setReachability()](./plugin-meetings.meetings.setreachability.md) |  | initializes the reachability instance for Meetings |
|  [startReachability()](./plugin-meetings.meetings.startreachability.md) |  | initializes and starts gathering reachability for Meetings |
|  [syncMeetings()](./plugin-meetings.meetings.syncmeetings.md) |  | syncs all the meeting from server |
|  [unregister()](./plugin-meetings.meetings.unregister.md) |  | Explicitly tears down the meetings plugin by deregistering the device, disconnecting from mercury, and stops listening to locus events |
|  [uploadLogs(options)](./plugin-meetings.meetings.uploadlogs.md) |  | Uploads logs to the webex services for tracking |
